title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.14 - Requests for Port Authority employees to perform work or services to be directed to superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.14 - Requests for Port Authority employees to perform work or services to be directed to superintendent

State Regulations

The occupant shall not directly request any Port

Authority employee to do any work or perform any service for it, but shall make
all such requests to the office of the superintendent of the
terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1221.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
